English: So Chitose went with those guys, huh...
Chinese: 這樣啊……千歲跟他們行動。
Korean: 그런가… 치토세는 그 녀석들하고 간 건가
German: Also ist Chitose jetzt einer von ihnen ...

English:
You heard I was working with Kamishiro, right?
So are you going to leave the team like Chitose?
Chinese:
你知道我跟神代企業一夥了吧？
……你也要像千歲一樣，脫離隊伍嗎？
Korean:
내가 카미시로와 한 패라는 말을 들었겠지?
……너도 치토세처럼 팀에서 빠질 거냐?
German:
Du hast gehört, dass ich mit Kamishiro
zusammengearbeitet habe, richtig? Wirst du
also das Team verlassen wie Chitose?

English:
You should cut your ties with Kamishiro!
Isn't there some other way?
Chinese:
趕快跟神代企業斷絕關係！
沒有其他方法了嗎？
Korean:
카미시로와 연을 끊어야 해!
다른 방법은 없어?
German:
Du solltest dich von Kamishiro lossagen!
Gibt es keinen anderen Weg?

English:
...No matter what you say, I'm not cutting ties
with Kamishiro. For Erika's therapy, I need
Kamishiro's-- Kishibe's support.
Chinese:
……不管你怎麼說，我都不打算跟
神代企業斷絕往來。要治療艾莉卡，
一定需要神代──岸部的援助。
Korean:
…무슨 말을 하든 나는 카미시로와 관계를 끊을 생각은 없어.
에리카의 치료에는 카미시로의―― 키시베의 원조가 필요해
German:
... Egal was du sagst, ich werde mich nicht von
Kamishiro lossagen. Für Erikas Behandlung brauche
ich Kamishiros – Kishibes Unterstützung.

English:
I had the feeling something was going on...
That you were up to something dangerous for me.
Chinese:
從不久之前，我就大概察覺到了。
哥哥，為了我在做危險的事。
Korean:
얼마 전부터 왠지 모르게 알고 있었어.
오빠가 나를 위해 위험한 일을 하고 있다는걸
German:
Ich hatte so ein Gefühl, dass etwas los wäre ...
dass du mir zuliebe etwas Gefährliches planst.

English: It's fine, Ryuji... Just let it be.
German: Es ist schon gut, Ryuji ... Lass es bleiben.

English: Don't worry about me. I'm fine...
German: Mach dir um mich keine Sorgen. Es geht mir gut ...

English: It was for you that I--!
Chinese: 妳以為我是為了誰，才一直──！！

English:
Then you can just stop...
I don't want it anymore.
Chinese:
如果是為了我，那已經夠了喔。
……我已經，沒關係了。
German:
Dann hör einfach damit auf ...
Ich will das nicht mehr.

English:
You don't what?!
You don't want to live?!
Chinese:
……妳說沒關係！？
難道死了也沒關係嗎！？
German:
Du willst was nicht?!
Du willst nicht mehr leben?!

English:
Don't say that...!
I won't listen to you say that...!
Chinese: 別說傻話了……！　我是……為了什麼……！
Korean:
바보같은 말 하지 마……!
내가……어떤 마음으로……큭!
German:
Sag das nicht ...!
Ich will das nicht von dir hören ...!
